title: Shinseiki Idol Densetsu: Kanata Seven Change
original_name: 新世紀アイドル伝説 彼方セブンチェンジ
sinopse:
What path to stardom does the super-idol who suddenly turns up at Jump take!? The true story (not) as told by the most handsome guy ever to grace Shonen Jump (that's what you have to believe as you read it)! What a success story!!

(Source: shonenjump.com)
